title: Revolutionizing Retrieval-Augmented Generation with Enhanced PDF Structure Recognition. (arXiv:2401.12599v1 [cs.AI])
abstract: With the rapid development of Large Language Models (LLMs), Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) has become a predominant method in the field of professional knowledge-based question answering. Presently, major foundation model companies have opened up Embedding and Chat API interfaces, and frameworks like LangChain have already integrated the RAG process. It appears that the key models and steps in RAG have been resolved, leading to the question: are professional knowledge QA systems now approaching perfection? This article discovers that current primary methods depend on the premise of accessing high-quality text corpora. However, since professional documents are mainly stored in PDFs, the low accuracy of PDF parsing significantly impacts the effectiveness of professional knowledge-based QA. translated_title: 用增强的PDF结构识别来革新检索增强的生成模型
translated_abstract: 随着大型语言模型（LLM）的快速发展，检索增强的生成（RAG）已成为专业知识问答领域中的主要方法。目前，主要的基础模型公司已经开放了嵌入式和聊天API接口，而LangChain等框架已经整合了RAG流程。看似RAG中的关键模型和步骤已经得到解决，这就引出了一个问题：专业知识问答系统是否接近完美了？本文发现当前的主要方法依赖于访问高质量的文本语料库的前提。然而，由于专业文档主要以PDF形式存储，PDF解析的低准确性显著影响了基于专业知识的问答的效果。我们在数百个来自相应真实世界专业文档的问题上进行了经验性的RAG实验。结果显示，ChatDOC是一个配备了全景视图功能的RAG系统，能够提高问答的准确性和效率。
tldr: 本论文通过增强的PDF结构识别来革新检索增强的生成模型，解决了专业文档中PDF解析的低准确性对基于专业知识问答的影响，提高了问答的准确性和效率。
en_tdlr: This paper revolutionizes Retrieval-Augmented Generation models by enhancing PDF structure recognition, addressing the issue of low accuracy in PDF parsing for professional documents and improving the accuracy and efficiency of knowledge-based question answering.
